item.title: WordEmbedding
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: TEXT processing deals with humongous amount of text to perform different range of tasks like clustering in the g oogle search example, classification in the second and Machine Translation. How to create a representation for words that capture their meanings, semantic relationships and the different types of contexts they are used in. 作为 Embedding 层嵌入到深度模型中，实现将高维
